name: 小小毛巾爱玩水 / Wheels On The Bus
lyric:
小小毛巾爱玩水
洗洗胳背洗洗腿
再和小脸亲亲嘴
小小毛巾爱玩水
洗洗胳背洗洗腿
再和小脸亲亲嘴

The wheels on the bus go
Round and round
Round and round
Round and round
The wheels on the bus go
Round and round
All through the town
The horn on the bus goes
Beep beep beep
Beep beep beep
Beep beep beep
The horn on the bus goes
Beep beep beep
All through the town
